dcterms:description: A dataset composed of restaurant reviews and laptop reviews, used for aspect-based sentiment analysis with three sentiment polarities: positive, neutral, and negative.
dcterms:title: SemEval 2014 Task 4

dcterms:creator: Svetlana Kiritchenko
Xiaodan Zhu
Colin Cherry

dcterms:description: A dataset gathered from Twitter, used for detecting aspects and sentiment in customer reviews, labeled with three sentiment polarities: positive, neutral, and negative.
dcterms:title: ACL 14 Twitter dataset
